Articles.Content: Right now, it's all or nothing when putting science in a pod. It's also all or nothing taking it out. It would be nice to when reviewing science, have another option to take so you can selectively remove science from a pod or lab to move elsewhere without taking it all.
Could be useful but also could be overwhelming to some. But a cool idea still

It would go with the review data option and show as an extra icon for each data viewed and gives you the option to "Transfer". If you select that, you then get all the places in reach or on the craft that it can be transfered to just like when transfering kerbals around a craft, only the data window would not close. This would allow you to transfer it again if you clicked the wrong place as well as keep on looking through the data without loosing your place and having to cycle through a bunch again to get where you where
